transcription.text: Welcome to Zoom. Enter your meeting ID followed by pound. Enter your participant ID. You are in the meeting now. There is one other participant in the meeting. Good afternoon. The companies are going to be companies you're working with, also companies you're marketing toward. We do have a full sales pipeline that's called the deals workflow in here as well. And then positions, jobs you're looking to fill. So those are kind of our three main record types within PC Recruiter. They're all interrelated, all interconnected. I've got like companies here in Boston. So I can kind of create these different lists and I can always go into any of the lists. Open that list right up. Full mass communication. So your schedule is going to be kind of your daily to-do list. So you're going to be able to place various meetings, phone calls, whatnot on that calendar. There's a different view. So you could do some different things like that too. Those are going to be configurable. And then you could create a record like I have here for Abacus.
